channel.title: Lagex Development Team!
channel.description:
############################################################################################### [size=20pt]Ruin-Scape, Created by Lagex Ltd.[/size]
Hello everyone!
I am currently founding a new server that is Dodian based, but it wont be boring like the others. I am currently looking for interested people to join the Lagex Staff. Below are the jobs you can have. (If they are empty...)
[size=15pt]Owner[/size] Mod Joe Mod David empty (Whoever hosts gets owner)
[size=15pt]Co-Owner[/size] Mod Vicky Mod Brandy Mod Matt
[size=15pt]Administrators[/size] empty empty
[size=15pt]Moderators[/size] empty empty empty empty empty empty empty empty empty empty
If you wish to join the Lagex Staff, please PM me asap.
~Thanks! ##############################################################################################

item.title: Lagex Development Team!
item.dc:creator: @sic_pure sic pure
item.description:
@sic_pure wrote:

Anyone who hosts the server has complete control over anything and everything on that server, you do not. I would suggest you host it yourself unless you seriously trust that person to do what you say.

Read full topic

item.title: Lagex Development Team!
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Bump
[/quote]

No bumping!

EDIT: I WAS NOT BUMPING

I do not want to join

The End![/quote]It’s ok.
If he’s posting more bumps when there is no post made, it will not bring up the post.

Read full topic
